info.name: Pink Modding v2
info.description:
A very pink/purple version of the modding discussion pages on the osu! website.
Because if it's not as pink as possible, is it really osu?

Due to how the website's URLs are set up, some of this code will effect Beatmap Information pages too. 
I may make an expanded theme later on to recolor the rest of the website, but I just want the modding discussions to be easier on the eyes for now.


IF SOMETHING BREAKS:
Contact me @NoffyNoffeh on twitter! I'll fix any errors that come from the website being updated as soon as I can.
Also if something breaks, be sure to check your theme for updates, I may have already fixed it.
info.additionalInfo:
November 5th Update - Miscellaneous fixes to account for website changes.

August 7th Update -
Updated the user filter to have different colored backgrounds for gmt, bn, admin, and regular users.

May 25th Update -
Fixed the background color for General All/ General Diff/ History tab selector, as it was not working after an update to the website. Should be fixed now!

May 8th 2018 Update -
Add color for user filter dropdown.

April 8th 2018 Update -
Fixed some elements that were not colored, adjusted the button image to be a less bright purple.
Readjusted the color scheme for history tab events slightly.
